00040 class Zend_View_Helper_Placeholder_Registry

00046     const REGISTRY_KEY = 'Zend_View_Helper_Placeholder_Registry';

00058     protected $_items = array();

00065     public static function getRegistry()
00066     {
00067         if (Zend_Registry::isRegistered(self::REGISTRY_KEY)) {
00068             $registry = Zend_Registry::get(self::REGISTRY_KEY);
00069         } else {
00070             $registry = new self();
00071             Zend_Registry::set(self::REGISTRY_KEY, $registry);
00072         }
00073 
00074         return $registry;
00075     }

00084     public function createContainer($key, array $value = array())
00085     {
00086         $key = (string) $key;
00087 
00088         $this->_items[$key] = new $this->_containerClass(array());
00089         return $this->_items[$key];
00090     }

00098     public function getContainer($key)
00099     {
00100         $key = (string) $key;
00101         if (isset($this->_items[$key])) {
00102             return $this->_items[$key];
00103         }
00104 
00105         $container = $this->createContainer($key);
00106 
00107         return $container;
00108     }

00117     {

00143     public function deleteContainer($key)
00144     {
00145         $key = (string) $key;
00146         if (isset($this->_items[$key])) {
00147             unset($this->_items[$key]);
00148             return true;

00150 
00151         return false;

00160     public function setContainerClass($name)
00161     {
00162         if (!class_exists($name)) {
00163             require_once 'Zend/Loader.php';
00164             Zend_Loader::loadClass($name);
00165         }
00166 
00167         $reflection = new ReflectionClass($name);
00168         if (!$reflection->isSubclassOf(new ReflectionClass('Zend_View_Helper_Placeholder_Container_Abstract'))) {
00169             require_once 'Zend/View/Helper/Placeholder/Registry/Exception.php';
00170             throw new Zend_View_Helper_Placeholder_Registry_Exception('Invalid Container class specified');
00171         }
00172 
00173         $this->_containerClass = $name;
00174         return $this;
00175     }
